name: Zinuru The Great
description: A group of uncultivated heathenish barbarians have taken over Zinuru's lab and transporter to collect gold from a rich-gold filled Temple. Zinuru must activate her weapon and might, take over the transporter room, make it to the gold filled Temple, and muster the courage to collect as much gold as possible in every chamber of the Temple. The mission ends when Zinuru locates the secret Lab with the second transporter.
